Text: thats a hugh move pack indeed.

Ha, this is a wonderfull beast, Friend. There will be some long, dark, cold winter nights in company with good SF movies.
Thanx, Man, I'll smoke an extra number in Your remembrance!
btw. how come, that nobody has got more than 98,1%. Has the full seeding stoppet? Does nobody have the full pack?

Hm. It appears, that the original seeder BOZX has left the scene. All peers seem to have 98,1%. At present, I have 98,5%, but the DL has ceased.
Dear BOZX, couldn't You seed just for a day or two, so somebodey else can take over?

Fahrenheit 451? THX1134? 1984? Blade Runner? logans run? Solyaris? Dune? ????
Do you know what sci-fi is? have you ever seen a good one? I was actually shocked to see sunshine at the bottom of this list.
I would like you to explain to me how you can even call Constantine and Superman.Returns Science fiction??? you should not call something a sci-fi movie pack if you are only going to include only the worst years of the genre. you have a problem with Star Wars Episode IV, V & VI, and you must be the only person on the planet who thought the second two Matrix movies were better than the first one. Do all the real Sci-Fi fans a favor and rename this folder. it was a waste of my time even to open it, and there is no way I would use 43Gib for this crap!
